typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string,
	keyfield as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['/Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/input','Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/processed'],
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/rawzone/input/','BusinessHours','*.csv'))]) ~> sourceRawZone
sourceRawZone alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'ukgdatalakefspoc',
	folderPath: (concat('Raw_Zone/dineshpoc/delta/',$filename)),
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[($keyfield)],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
